类 DataSetAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • xlsys.base.dataset.DataSetAdapter
  • 所有已实现的接口:

    public class DataSetAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSetListener

    customTrigger 在接口中 DataSetListener
